Package net.ssehub.comani.analysis.variabilitychange.diff

Class ModelFileDiff

java.lang.Object
net.ssehub.comani.analysis.variabilitychange.diff.FileDiff
net.ssehub.comani.analysis.variabilitychange.diff.ModelFileDiff
public class ModelFileDiff
extends FileDiff
This class implements analysis methods and required attributes for counting the changes made to a model file (Kconfig).

In particular, this class differentiates between changed lines containing general model elements, e.g. help texts or comments, and lines that contain variability information, e.g. configuration symbols.

Author:
Christian Kroeher

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ModelFileDiff​(java.lang.String[] diffLines, int changesStartLineNum)
    Construct a new ModelFileDiff.

    This constructor will call the super constructor of FileDiff, which will start a line-wise analysis of the given diff lines calling the inherited methods normalize(String, int) and isVariabilityChange(String, int) defined in this class.
    Counting the number of changed lines (regardless of variability information) is done in FileDiff.

  • Constructor Details

    • ModelFileDiff

      public ModelFileDiff​(java.lang.String[] diffLines, int changesStartLineNum)
      Construct a new ModelFileDiff.

      This constructor will call the super constructor of FileDiff, which will start a line-wise analysis of the given diff lines calling the inherited methods normalize(String, int) and isVariabilityChange(String, int) defined in this class.
      Counting the number of changed lines (regardless of variability information) is done in FileDiff.
      Parameters:
      diffLines - the lines of a model diff
      changesStartLineNum - the index of the line in the given diffLines that marks the starting point of the change details in terms of added and removed lines

  • Method Details

    • normalize

      protected java.lang.String normalize​(java.lang.String diffLine, int diffLinePosition)
      Normalize the given diff line, e.g. remove leading "+" or "-", check if the line is a general comment or contains general comments as part of the line.
      Specified by:
      normalize in class FileDiff
      Parameters:
      diffLine - the line of a diff description to be normalized
      diffLinePosition - the index of the given diff line in FileDiff.diffLines used, e.g., for backtracking
      Returns:
      the normalized diff line without leading "+" or "-"; in case of comments, only the non-comment part will be return, which may lead to an empty string

    • isVariabilityChange

      protected boolean isVariabilityChange​(java.lang.String cleanDiffLine, int cleanDiffLinePosition)
      Check if the given diff line (without leading "+" or "-") describes a change to variability information. The result of this check depends on the possible variability definitions in the specific file type and, thus, has to be implemented in each class derived from this class (see FileDiff.

      Please note that returning true results in increasing the added or removed variability line number (counter).
      Specified by:
      isVariabilityChange in class FileDiff
      Parameters:
      cleanDiffLine - the line of a diff description to be checked for variability information without leading "+" or "-"
      cleanDiffLinePosition - the index of the given diff line in FileDiff.diffLines used, e.g., for backtracking
      Returns:
      true if the given diff line contains variability information, false otherwise
